channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Morning Live
channel.desc: Join Gethin Jones, Helen Skelton, Michelle Ackerley and the team for conversation, advice and tips to make your day that little bit easier.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Live: Wimbledon 2025
channel.desc: Isa Guha presents live coverage of the Championships at Wimbledon, where the second round is getting under way. The All England Club is an annual highlight for most British players, with 2025's cohort hoping to use their grass court experience and home support to their advantage. Five British women reached the second round last year for the first time in 37 years, and hopes are high of continued home success once again.

channel.title: BBC News at One

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Live: Wimbledon 2025
channel.desc: Clare Balding presents continued coverage of the second round at Wimbledon, the third tennis grand slam tournament of the year. World number ones Jannik Sinner and Aryna Sabalenka have already reached the finals of the Australian and French Opens in 2025, but a third grand slam decider in the same year would be breaking new ground for both, as neither of them has previously reached the Wimbledon final. Before that, however, they must navigate their way through the early rounds.

channel.title: Bargain Hunt

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Live: Wimbledon 2025
channel.desc: The live coverage from the famous grass lawns of Wimbledon continues, with players now beginning to think about making it to the second week of the tournament. At this stage in 2024, there were two all-British clashes in the second round, with both providing an upset. British number one Katie Boulter lost in three tight sets to Harriet Dart, while Jack Draper was sent packing in straight sets by Cameron Norrie.

channel.title: Such Brave Girls
channel.desc: Josie's finally at art school and in love. Deb's hoping for the next step with Dev, but her sister lets out a secret that threatens their entire relationship. Billie explores a risky romance with an older man.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Such Brave Girls
channel.desc: Deb questions where she stands with Dev. Seb starts to suspect Josie might not actually be going to a late-night book club at all. Billie's daddy issues take a new turn as she decides that she might not be getting the princess treatment after all.
